Plot: A veteran cop, Murtaugh, is partnered with a young suicidal cop, Riggs. Both having one thing in common; hating working in pairs. Now they must learn to work with one another to stop a gang of drug smugglers.
Title: Lethal Weapon
Actors: Mel Gibson, Danny Glover, Gary Busey, Mitchell Ryan
tomatoConsensus: The most successful installment in a phenomenally successful series, Lethal Weapon helped redefine action movies for the 1980s and 1990s.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 5 wins & 1 nomination.
